languages.text: "Меня это не затруднит. Наоборот, я сочту за честь взять на себя труд по расширению ваших познаний".
"It is not a waste of my time or ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I would consider it an honour to increase your knowledge of your dynasty's history."
languages.original_text: "Меня это не затруднит. Наоборот, я сочту за честь взять на себя труд по расширению ваших познаний".

traits.locale_text: "It is well within my time and ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I will consider it an honour to strive to expand your awareness."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is well within my time and ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I will consider it an honour to strive to expand your awareness."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is not a waste of my time or ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I would consider it an honour to increase your knowledge of your dynasty's history."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is not a waste of my time or ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I would consider it an honour to increase your knowledge of your dynasty's history."

languages.text: « Je ne considère pas cela comme une perte de temps, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. En fait, ce serait même un honneur pour moi d'enrichir vos connaissances concernant l'histoire de votre dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "It is not a waste of my time or ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I would consider it an honour to increase your knowledge of your dynasty's history."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne considère pas cela comme une perte de temps, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. En fait, ce serait même un honneur pour moi d'enrichir vos connaissances concernant l'histoire de votre dynastie. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No es un desperdicio de mi tiempo ni de mis habilidades, Lord Capitán. De hecho, considero un honor la oportunidad de aumentar sus conocimientos sobre la historia de su dinastía».
languages.original_text: "It is not a waste of my time or ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I would consider it an honour to increase your knowledge of your dynasty's history."

traits.locale_text: «No es un desperdicio de mi tiempo ni de mis habilidades, Lord Capitán. De hecho, considero un honor la oportunidad de aumentar sus conocimientos sobre la historia de su dinastía».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “这么做并不是在浪费我的时间，舰长大人。老实说，如果能增进您对王朝历史的了解，这会是我的荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "It is not a waste of my time or ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I would consider it an honour to increase your knowledge of your dynasty's history."

traits.locale_text: “这么做并不是在浪费我的时间，舰长大人。老实说，如果能增进您对王朝历史的了解，这会是我的荣幸。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「これは私の時間や能力の無駄ではないです、ロード・キャプテン。これはとても誇り高いことです。王朝の歴史についての知識を身に着けることができるのですから」
languages.original_text: "It is not a waste of my time or ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I would consider it an honour to increase your knowledge of your dynasty's history."

traits.locale_text: 「これは私の時間や能力の無駄ではないです、ロード・キャプテン。これはとても誇り高いことです。王朝の歴史についての知識を身に着けることができるのですから」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist keine Vergeudung meiner Zeit oder meines Könnens, Lord Captain. Ich würde es sogar als Ehre ansehen, Euer Wissen um die Geschichte unserer Dynastie zu mehren."
languages.original_text: "It is not a waste of my time or ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I would consider it an honour to increase your knowledge of your dynasty's history."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist keine Vergeudung meiner Zeit oder meines Könnens, Lord Captain. Ich würde es sogar als Ehre ansehen, Euer Wissen um die Geschichte unserer Dynastie zu mehren."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ne zamanımı ne de becerilerimi boşa harcamış olurum Lord Kaptan. Hatta hanedanlık tarihi hakkındaki bilgilerinizi artırmayı bir onur addederim."
languages.original_text: "It is not a waste of my time or ability, Lord Captain. In fact, I would consider it an honour to increase your knowledge of your dynasty's history."
